title: How high are the contributions to the EU budget in 2024?
subtitle: As of 2024 the monthly average contribution to the EU's budget is as high as 25.40€ per person.
textNote: The European Union’s Budget for the 2024 calendar year amounts to €143 billion. A strong economy and a lower total population leads to a high per person contribution per month.
textSource: The Institute of Chartered Accountants in England and Wales
